description.value:
+20 Medicae Skill when used, if user doesn't have Medicae, can treat it as Basic Skill when using this. Contains 6 Doses of Stimm which must be replaced seperately.

Requirements

GM Dependant as to whether it is actually consumed on use

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
